sqlMap.select: SELECT A.MENU_ID AS MENU_ID, A.MENU_NM AS MENU_NM, A.MENU_DC AS MENU_DC, A.MENU_ORDR AS MENU_ORDR, A.UPPER_MENU_ID AS UPPER_MENU_ID, (SELECT CASE C.UPPER_MENU_ID WHEN '0' THEN '최상위메뉴' ELSE D.MENU_NM END FROM OE1TNMENUINFO C, OE1TNMENUINFO D WHERE C.UPPER_MENU_ID = D.MENU_ID AND C.MENU_ID = A.MENU_ID) AS UPPER_MENU_NM, A.PROGRM_ID AS PROGRM_ID, B.PROGRM_NM AS PROGRM_NM, A.USE_AT AS USE_AT FROM OE1TNMENUINFO A, OE1TNPROGRMINFO B WHERE A.PROGRM_ID = B.PROGRM_ID AND A.MENU_ID = #menuId#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, ALL_LIST.* FROM (
/* 구현 Sql */
SELECT MENU_ID, MENU_NM, MENU_DC, MENU_ORDR, UPPER_MENU_ID, PROGRM_ID, USE_AT FROM OE1TNMENUINFO WHERE 1=1
MENU_ID LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #searchKeyword#), '%')
MENU_NM LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #searchKeyword#), '%')
MENU_ORDR <> 3
ORDER BY MENU_ID DESC /* 구현 Sql */
) ALL_LIST ) WHERE RNUM > #firstIndex# AND RNUM <= #firstIndex# + #recordCountPerPage#

MENU_ID LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #searchKeyword#), '%')
